summary: All recipes in the pot and the oven are overwritten with vegetarian recipes. All stews/soups (and chicken dumplings) are vegetarianised. Requires all 3 DLC / Legendary edition.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple cooking mod that vegetarianises cooking menus by replacing all meat recipes, some meat foods and introducing 1 new item using a vanilla mesh. It probably conflicts with all cooking and eating mods. It's a simple way to cook more foods at the cooking pot and you don't have to scroll through 300 meat recipes you never use (or 300 any recipes you never use: the total recipe number is the same as vanilla skyrim)

Requires Dawnguard, Hearthfire and Dragonborn or the legendary edition of Skyrim. (Probably doesn't actually need DG but it is slaved to it so don't try and use it without unless you edit it)

If you use the unofficial dragonborn patch or USLEEP you need to use tes5edit to remove its cooked boar recipe for a totally meat free recipe screen.
[b][u]
[size=4]
CHANGES MADE:[/size][/u][/b]

[u][b]New food from overwritten recipe[/b][/u]

Grilled Chicken Breast recipe > [b]Baked Ash Yam recipe[/b] (uses baked potato mesh and is basically a baked potato)
Recipe: ash yam, salt pile

[b][u]Food and recipes overwritten[/u][/b]
(the original foods are no longer in the world, vegetarian versions take their place)

Horker and Ash Yam Stew > [b]Mushroom and Ash Yam Stew[/b]
Recipe: garlic, mora tapinella, ash yam

Chicken Dumpling > [b]Carrot Dumpling[/b] (only at oven still)
Recipe: salt pile, garlic, carrot, leek, sack of flour

Clam Chowder > [b]Glowing Mushroom Soup[/b] (doesn't glow yet unfortunately)
Recipe: potato, glowing mushroom, jug of milk, butter

Venison Stew > [b]Mushroom Stew[/b]
Recipe: potato, leek, scaly pholiota, mora tapinella

Horker Stew > [b]Tomato Ash Yam Stew[/b]
recipe: garlic, lavender, tomato, ash yam

Beef Stew > [b]Gourd Stew[/b]
recipe: salt pile, garlic, carrot, gourd

[b][u]Recipes overwritten [/u][/b]
(the original foods are still in the world but you can't cook them)

Mudcrab legs recipe > [b]Garlic Bread recipe[/b]
Recipe: garlic, bread

Venison Chop recipe > [b]Sweet Roll recipe[/b]
Recipe: snowberries, nord mead, sack of flour

Salmon Steak recipe > [b]Bread recipe[/b]
Recipe: salt pile, sack of flour

Rabbit haunch recipe > [b]Baked potatoes recipe[/b]
Recipe: salt pile, potato

Pheasant Roast recipe > [b]Braided Bread recipe[/b]
Recipe: salt pile, sack of flour

Mammoth Steak recipe > [b]Potato Bread recipe[/b]
Recipe: ale, potato, sack of flour

Horse Haunch recipe > [b]Apple Dumpling recipe[/b]
Recipe: sack of flour, green apple, red apple

Horker Loaf recipe > [b]Boiled Creme Treat recipe[/b]
Recipe: lavender, jug of milk

Leg of Goat recipe >[b] Lavender Dumpling recipe[/b]
Recipe: salt pile, lavender, moon sugar, sack of flour, snowberries

Cooked Beef recipe > [b]Grilled Leeks recipe[/b]
Recipe: leek, salt pile



[b][u][color=#ff0000][size=4]VERSION 2[/size][/color][/u][/b]

This version uses more salt and snowberries. If you use mods that increase the amount of salt you can find and buy and mods like [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16553/?]Harvest Overhaul[/url] that mean you can pick more ingredients from plants you'll have enough to use. If not the original version will be better for you.

This version also removes the Boiled Creme Treat recipe and replaces it with a Carrot (formerly chicken) Dumpling recipe at the pot as well as the oven. Sweet rolls look yummier than boiled creme treats if we're honest.

[b]changes from version 1:
[/b]
Horker Stew > Tomato Ash Yam Stew
recipe: garlic, lavender, tomato, ash yam, [b][u]salt pile[/u][/b]

Horker and Ash Yam Stew > Mushroom and Ash Yam Stew
Recipe: garlic, mora tapinella, ash yam, [b][u]salt pile[/u][/b][b][u]
[/u][/b]
Clam Chowder > Glowing Mushroom Soup
Recipe: potato, glowing mushroom, jug of milk, butter, [u][b]salt pile[/b][/u]

Venison Stew > Mushroom Stew
Recipe: potato, leek, scaly pholiota, mora tapinella, [b][u]salt pile[/u][/b]

Mudcrab legs recipe > Garlic Bread recipe
Recipe: garlic, bread, [u][b]salt pile[/b][/u]

Venison Chop recipe > Sweet Roll recipe
Recipe: [u][b]2[/b][/u] snowberries, nord mead, sack of flour

Horse Haunch recipe > Apple Dumpling recipe
Recipe: sack of flour, green apple, red apple, [u][b]snowberries[/b][/u]


Boiled Creme Treat recipe removed in favour of Carrot Dumpling recipe at pot:

Horker Loaf recipe > Carrot Dumpling recipe
Recipe: salt pile, garlic, carrot, leek, sack of flour
author: rinabean
